body:
Just a quick THANK YOU to the workshop organisators and presenters for 
sharing such a bunch of great material with the community. First in 
real-time by broadcasting the conference, and now in almost-real-time by 
being so quick putting everything on to the website! Lars.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2011-September/008155.html).</sup>
